attributes.action: Call a referendum regarding Digital ID to allow the country to decide only.
attributes.additional_details:
With the security issues with china. And cyber attacks we need to know our details are secure. If  our details are stolen we need to be able to remove ourselves from your digital ID with out losing our rights to live, work, feed, or any other parts of our lives from health, benefits and anything else we want to do without being affected if not signed up for digital ID.
Also plans for mental health, brain damage, blind and partial sighted people that don't use digital systems.
attributes.background: We want the public to make the decision regarding digital ID. We believe we need clear information regarding how ID will be used and the clear boundaries for future adaptations and a legal route to challenge in the future.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Hold a referendum on introducing mandatory identity cards in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734246
